resources.string: Will restrict access to the browser bookmarks and browser history
Will restrict access to the browser downloads
Will restrict access to the Android calendar
Will restrict access to the SIM contacts
Will restrict access to the user dictionary
Will restrict access to the Android E-mail information (accounts, messages, attachments)
Will restrict access to any system property with the name containing \'hostname\' (Wikipedia)

Will restrict access to any system property with the name containing \'imei\' (Wikipedia).
Please note, that you have to restrict the function getDeviceId in the Phone category in order to prevent apps from accessing the IMEI.
Will restrict access to any system property with the name containing \'macaddr\' (Wikipedia)
Will restrict access to any system property with the name containing \'serialno\'
Will restrict access to any system property with the name containing \'cid\' (Card Identification Register = SD card serial number)
Will restrict access to the system build properties file
Will restrict direct access to CID (Card Identification Register = SD card serial number)
Will restrict direct access to CID (Card Identification Register = SD card serial number)
Will restrict access to the Google advertising identifier
Will restrict access to the Android ID

Will inhibit to get input device descriptors. Input device descriptors are unique and stable identifiers for input devices like keyboard, stylus, button, touchscreen etc.
See also the Google documentation
Will restrict direct access to android_id, acquired through the Google services provider

Will restrict access to the hardware serial number, if available.
See also the Google documentation
Will inhibit to get the IP addresses associated with a given host.
Will inhibit to get the address of a host according to the given host name.
Will restrict access to the internet. Please be aware, that there is no usage data available for this function.
Will restrict access to the internet
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to the account manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to the activity manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to the clipboard manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to the connectivity manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to content providers
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to the location manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to parts of the telephony manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to parts of the telephony manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to the package manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to parts of the telephony manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to parts of the telephony manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to the window manager
Will restrict direct inter-process calls to the Wi-Fi manager
Will restrict location updates through the phone state listener
Will restrict access to messages stored on the SIM card
Will restrict access to SMS messages
Will restrict access to MMS messages
Will restrict access to SMS and MMS messages
Will restrict access to voicemail messages
Will restrict access to hidden function to get WifiConfiguration
Will restrict access to hidden function to get NfcAdapter

Will inhibit to get a registration ID for
Google Cloud Messaging.

Will prevent the app from receiving
Google Cloud Messages.

Will restrict access to the IMEI (GSM phones) or MEID / ESN (CDMA phones).

See also the Google documentation.
Will restrict access to hidden function to get ISIM information
Will restrict access to hidden function to get ISIM information
Will restrict access to hidden function to get ISIM information
Will restrict access to hidden function to get the alpha identifier for line 1
Will restrict access to hidden function to get MSISDN
Will restrict access to the unique subscriber ID, for example, the IMSI for a GSM phone.
Will restrict access to carrier and APN information
Will restrict access to the call log

Will restrict access to the default sensor of a given type.
See also the Google documentation for sensor types.

Will restrict access to the list of available sensors of a certain type.
See also the Google documentation for sensor types.
Will restrict access to a Linux shell
Will restrict access to a root Linux shell
Will restrict access to secondary external storage(s) (article). Please be aware, that there is no usage data available for this function.
Will restrict access to primary external storage (article). Please be aware, that there is no usage data available for this function.

Will restrict access to the current state of the primary external storage device.
See Google documentation for possible states.
Will restrict access to files on the SD card (or internal storage for devices without)
Will restrict access to a list of applications installed on the phone to provide search suggestions
